info.title: Library API
info.description: Library Backend API for managing books, users, and book rentals

get.description: Get a paginated list of books with optional filtering and sorting

description.example: A novel about the American Dream

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific book

put.description: Update an existing book (Admin only). Uses optimistic locking.

delete.description: Soft delete a book (Admin only). Uses optimistic locking. Cannot delete books with active rentals.

409.description: Conflict - Book has active rentals or version mismatch

post.description: Create a new book rental for the authenticated user

409.description: Conflict - Book not available or user already has active rental

429.description: Too many requests - Rate limit exceeded

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific rental including book details

post.description: Extend the rental period for an active rental (max 5 extensions)

patch.description: Update the reading progress percentage for a rental

post.description: Return a rented book and mark the rental as completed

409.description: Conflict - Rental already returned or concurrent modification

post.description: Create a new user account and return authentication token
Authenticate user and return JWT token
Get a new JWT token using the current valid token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information

description.example: A novel about the American Dream

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
